1450950.name: RPG Maker MZ - Zombie walk graphic material 01
1450950.description:
Time to create your favorite Zombies with a creepy clown look or the go-to classic, shuffling man-zombies right out of their graves and starved for flesh! Now you can create spooky, horrific zombies (but still have fun) with blood, scars, clown hats and more!

This is not a character generator, but by using editing software you can create very original and spooky character sprites for your RPG projects! Choose from a great selection of zombie parts such as unique hairstyles, blood and scratch marks, zombie features, accessories and outfits! 10 pre-made sample walking characters and editable PNG and PSD files are also included for your convenience and creativity!

The more original characters you create, the more original your story becomes! So go ahead and get inspired with this new character pack!

FEATURES:

* This is NOT a character generator pack. This pack contains materials to create walking character sprites using editing software (editing software not included)
* Zombie body: 4 male variations with: white eyes / red eyes / black eyes / blue-marked eyes
* Zombie facial features: 3 variations - scratch mark / blood mark / clown makeup
* 3 accessories: syringe / clown hat / beret hat
* 4 hair: bald / front balding / clown bald / short
* 5 clothes: rubbish / waist wrap-up / bandage / clown outfit / soldier
* 10 pre-made sample character walking sprites that were made with the materials from this pack
* PNG and PSD files included for editing! (You need editing software like photoshop to use these files)
* This pack is for use in RPG Makers, Visual Novel games or the engine of your choice. However, you may not sell your created game if it’s made with game development software other than the RPG Maker franchise or Visual Novel Maker.
1450950.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
